post.author: hardcore_gamer
post.body:
I am working on a new project with a pal of mine, and its called The Aviton experiment!
The story is on earth, in a secret base called Aviton. And it all happens in the moderns times.
Now here is the really cool thing, since it takes place in modern times, there will be loads on new textures. The base
does not have a high tech feel to it like the levels in Doom3. Oh! And there will also be new weapons! Thats were my friend comes in!
He is making new really cool weapons, and is at the moment making a revolver!

I have not start making the levels them selfs but i have bin experimenting around with the new textures to find a mapping style that i like. Here is a short video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0h4D9_ulyiY

I will post a image of the weapon (the revolver) that my friend is creating soon as well!

post.author: hardcore_gamer
post.body:
Kristus wrote:
Sounds like Half Life.


Indeed! exept this is a more of a horror version of that. We are still working on the story.
There will be some places where there will be some tech looking rooms, but nothing super high tech like
in Doom 3. More of like a mix of metal and concrete. And of course some offices! Or well that is if i can find any textures that look like that, so far i have had little luck on that:(
